card.name: Captain's Call
card.text: Create three 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Flurry Mage
card.text: Flying When Flurry Mage enters the battlefield, you may discard up to two cards. If you do, draw that many cards. Whenever you discard a card, creatures your opponents control get -1/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Repentia
card.text: Repentia deals damage to each creature equal to the life you’ve lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

card.name: Rimefire Bolt
card.text: Choose one or both — • Rimefire Bolt deals 2 damage to target creature. • Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Serena's Desolation
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Serena's Desolation, sacrifice a land. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, Serena's Desolation deals 2 damage to any target and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Ysolde, Arbiter of Power
card.text: +1: Target creature can't attack or block until the beginning of your next upkeep. -X: Exile target creature with converted mana cost X that dealt damage to you or a permanent you control since your last turn ended. -8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a permanent deals damage to you, exile it."

card.name: Retaliate
card.text: Destroy all creatures that dealt damage to you this turn.

card.name: Stony Silence
card.text: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.

card.name: Ambition's Cost
card.text: You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

card.name: Fatal Push
card.text: Destroy target creature if it has converted mana cost 2 or less. Revolt — Destroy that creature if it has converted mana cost 4 or less instead if a permanent you controlled left the battlefield this turn.

card.name: No Mercy
card.text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.

card.name: Pillory of the Sleepless
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block. Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life."
